name: Death Runner (zajcik97)
description:
Your main objective is reach the portal but it’s not that simple as it looks you will need to complete hundreds of obstacles, solve many puzzles and avoid rising lava as well!

Controls:
WSAD – To Walk.
E to pickup with objects or items.
Hold LMB to pick up and move boxes.
Z – While wearing jetpack to fly.
SHIFT – To Sprint.
